featured.text: The term “hula,” however, did not enter the English language until the 1700s, when British sailors first witnessed hula dancing in the Hawaiian Islands.

definition.zh_def: 夏威夷的；與夏威夷有關的
definition.en_def: Relating to the state of Hawaii or its culture, people, or language.
definition.example: She wore a beautiful Hawaiian dress to the luau.
